name: Case Management
description: Individual case management, counseling sessions, medical/mental health/immigration appointments, the facilitation of safe, enjoyable outings, and transition assistance into permanent housing
fullDescription: Individual case management, counseling sessions, medical/mental health/immigration appointments, the facilitation of safe, enjoyable outings, and transition assistance into permanent housing
whatTheyOffer: Supports residents with short-term and long-term needs and goals with the following services: - Intensive individual case management - Counseling sessions - Medical/mental health services - Immigration appointments - safe, enjoyable outings - Transition assistance into permanent housing. Mothers receive weekly one-on-one parenting consultations, support the strengthening of the mother-child bond, to create healthy, sustainable relationships between them. Weekly support groups are available.
howToGetIt: All services are available by appointment. Call main line (415) 751-7110 for appointment. For crisis, please call 24/7 - (877) 751-0880
